alert.note: Alert for Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sullivan, northwestern Carter and southwestern Washington Counties and the City of Bristol through 315 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bristol Tn, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Walnut Hill, Bluff City, South Holston Dam, Morril`s Cave, Blountville and Hunter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
